title: Part 1: Listener Calls + Brad Thor (ACS July 5)
itunes:title: Part 1: Listener Calls + Brad Thor (ACS July 5)
description:
Adam gives an update to the Centurion lounge bar controversy before getting into Century City Mall robbery. The gang takes listener calls from an airline pilot who has information about the recent delays and cancellations and a 7-year-old who has an important question about Buzz Lightyear. Author Brad Thor comes on the show to talk about his latest thriller, ‘Rising Tiger’ and gives his insights on the current political climate, US China relations, Vladimir Putin, and more. 

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

SimpliSafe.com/ADAM

TommyJohn.com/ADAM

The Jordan Harbinger Show
